trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class for readers of incoming request parameters for Web services implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

<xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> and other classes in the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> y otras clases en el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols> espacio de nombres admiten implementaciones de .NET Framework de los servicios Web a través de las operaciones HTTP-GET y HTTP-POST.

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams.
trans-unit.target: Los lectores y escritores de servicios web serializan y deserializan, respectivamente, entre los parámetros o los objetos devueltos de métodos Web y las secuencias de solicitud o respuesta HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard.
trans-unit.target: Los lectores y escritores de servicios web usan HTTP para el transporte pero no para intercambiar mensajes con la norma de SOAP.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> class provides, among other methods, a common <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method for all service-side readers of collections of name/value pairs into Web method parameters.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> clase proporciona, entre otros métodos, común <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> pares de método para todos los lectores de servicio de las colecciones de nombre/valor en parámetros de método Web.

trans-unit.source: The name/value pairs have been parsed from an incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Se ha analizado los pares nombre/valor de una solicitud HTTP entrante.

trans-unit.source: You typically will not need to use <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> or its descendant classes directly.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente no necesitará utilizar <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> o directamente en sus clases descendientes.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate types are used according to settings in an ASP.NET configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: Se utilizan los tipos adecuados según la configuración en un archivo de configuración de ASP.NET (Web.config).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the Web method for which the initializer is obtained.
Returns an initializer for the specified method.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> representing the Web method.

The object returned by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property of the `methodinfo` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> método es el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> propiedad de la `methodinfo` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> property value is an array of type <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters%2A> valor de la propiedad es una matriz de tipo <xref:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method is invoked during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> método se invoca durante la inicialización del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Later, at the time a request is processed, the initializer object is passed to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method of another <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> instance.
trans-unit.target: Más adelante, en el momento en que se procesa una solicitud, el objeto inicializador se pasa a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> método de otro <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader> instancia.

trans-unit.source: The other instance performs the actual reading.
trans-unit.target: La otra instancia realiza la lectura real.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> array, obtained through the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo.InParameters" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> class.
Initializes an instance.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> method is invoked at the time a request is processed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Initialize%2A> método se invoca en el momento en que se procesa una solicitud.

trans-unit.source: The input parameter, `o`, is obtained by calling the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> method on another instance during service initialization.
trans-unit.target: El parámetro de entrada, `o`, se obtiene mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.GetInitializer%2A> método en otra instancia durante la inicialización del servicio.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a method definition's parameter definitions are supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
A <see cref="T:System.Reflection.ParameterInfo" /> that specifies the parameter to check.
Determines whether a particular parameter type is supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
<see langword="true" /> if a method's parameter definitions are supported by the reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.LogicalMethodInfo" /> that specifies the method to check.
Determines whether a method definition's parameter definitions are supported by the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader" /> class.
<see langword="true" /> if a method's parameter definitions are supported by the reader; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> object that specifies the collection of name/value pairs containing method parameter names and values.
Translates a collection of name/value pairs into an array of objects representing method parameter values.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Object" /> objects representing method parameter values.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> method defined in thetwo classes derived from <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterReader> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterReader>.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> llama al método el <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> método definido en las dos clases deriva <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.UrlParameterReader> y <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.HtmlFormParameterReader>.

trans-unit.source: Those two classes' <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> methods take an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> parameter.
trans-unit.target: Esas dos clases <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.ValueCollectionParameterReader.Read%2A> métodos toman un <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> parámetro.
